title: Okinawa: the battle and the bomb
itunes:title: Okinawa: the battle and the bomb
itunes:subtitle: Saul David revisits one of the bloodiest clashes of the Pacific War and explains how it played a crucial part in the US decision to use atomic weapons against Japan. Historyextra.com/podcast
description:
On the 75th anniversary of the battle of Okinawa, historian Saul David revisits one of the bloodiest clashes of the Pacific War and explains how it played a crucial part in the United States’ decision to use atomic weapons against Japan. Historyextra.com/podcast

Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
